root.name: Secrets of Grindea
root.description: OverviewSecrets of Grindea is a tribute to SNES-era RPGs and will feature online 4 player co-op. It's due to be released late 2012 or early 2013.FeaturesCharacter customization: skill trees will allow you complete control over how your character develops over time and how you choose to play. There are no classes, so the player won't be restricted to following a single path. Thereâ€™s also a wide variety of haircuts, hats and head gear to make your character look unique.Online co-op support for up to four players.A lengthy story-driven campaign that take players through countless dungeons and fields of all shapes and kinds in the world of Grindea-- a great many deal of side quests and hidden content/puzzles is also available.Thousands of items to loot, hunt, craft, fish or dig up in order to improve your character's gear.A pet system-- players can catch any of the tameable animals in the world and have them accompany them on adventures while also giving boosts to to your character skills.Leaderboards and achievements.LinksOfficial Website
